sense.def: Illness Sign of the skeleton becoming visible and a skinny physical appearance as a consequence of extreme emaciation. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 7: 療飲中蠱毒，令人腹內堅痛，面目 青黃，淋露骨立，病變無常方 , “Recipe to heal unusual pathological changes such as gu poison taken in a drink, with the result that this person feels hardening and pain in his abdomen, with his face and eyes turning greenish-yellow, [sweat] dripping [like] dew drops, and an emaciation to the bones ”.
